title: Voting All Stars 2016 - missclick
body:
Dear Riot Support and fellow Gamers, 

So I was voting for the All Stars and accidently clicked on confirm after I only voted for EU LCS, now when I refresh and wanna vote for the other LCS Regions, it doesnt work anymore.

Is there any way to reset my Votes and to re-vote again? If yes, will I still get the Icon reward for voting after the Reset?

Thanks in Advance,

Siaoox3
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Please help me to vote in all star for 2016

Unfortunately, I'm not sure that there's anyway to reset votes after it's been confirmed.  The votes you did submit are still received, though!  I recommend sharing your feedback on the [Esports ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports)boards so the team can consider this as an option!  Good luck!
